author: gstein
msg: prevent duplicate exports. when srcdir is "." (or an absolute path to that
same dir), then two copies of the include headers were processed. Instead,
just process the true source dir, rather than those source headers *and* the

author: dreid
msg: I managed to miss these from a commit a while ago and so this hasn't
been working on BeOS for a while.  Oh well, here is the fix.

author: ben
msg: Compensate for missing getpwnam_r on FreeBSD 3.2.

author: rbb
msg: Fix a couple of places where copied code wasn't modified correctly.  This
should get the apr_poll functions working better when it is implemented

author: rbb
msg: FreeBSD's sendfile does not work if the FreeBSD version is less than
4.2 and we are compiled for a threaded program.  This change automatically
detects that set of conditions, and sets the sendfile detection correctly.
